testcase.title: Changing the View of Regulatory-Abstract View

steps.title: I perform Quick Search by "cancer"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Regulatory report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Regulatory" on page 'Results'
I click on button 'Abstract View' on page 'Results'

substeps.message: User is navigated to Regulatory report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Regulatory" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Results page is  displayed in Abstract view

steps.title: Results page is displayed in "Abstract" view

testcase.title: Changing the View of Regulatory-Table View

steps.title: I perform Quick Search by "cancer"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Regulatory report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Regulatory" on page 'Results'
I click on button 'Table view' on page 'Results'

substeps.message: User is navigated to Broker Research report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Broker Research" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: User is navigated to Regulatory report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Regulatory" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Results page is  displayed in Table view

steps.title: Results page is displayed in "Table" view
I perform Quick Search by "celecoxib"
'Search Results' page is opened

substeps.message: User is navigated to Regulatory report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Regulatory" on page 'Results'
I click 'Show all filters' link under the filters menu 'Document Type' on the Search Results page
I apply option "Meeting" from pop-up 'Show all filters'
the results table header should contain the filter applied "Meeting"

substeps.message: Filter Results' aredisplayed with proper count.The filter count is 43 and header count is 43

steps.title: I check results are displayed with proper count

substeps.message: [Header of results] Displayed applied filters: null

steps.title: there should not be applied filters after the user clicks link 'Clear' in filters group "Document Type"
the user clicks 'Show all filters' link under the filters menu 'Language(s)' on the Search Results page
the modal form 'Show all filters' should be displayed on Search Results page
the tab "Language(s)" should be selected in the modal form 'Show all filters' on the Search Results page
I select the filter view "Frequency" in the modal form 'Show all filters'

substeps.message: The Frequencyis Disaplyed displayed in the panel

steps.title: Verify selected "Frequency" filterview is Displayed
I select the filter view "Alphabetical" in the modal form 'Show all filters'

substeps.message: The Alphabeticalis Disaplyed displayed in the panel

steps.title: Verify selected "Alphabetical" filterview is Displayed

testcase.title: Verify Regulatory number of results after navigating from different datasets

steps.title: I perform Quick Search by "cancer"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Regulatory report type

the Report Type "Drugs" should be selected at the page 'Results'

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Regulatory" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: User is navigated to Regulatory report type

I click "4" pagination link on the top pagination
the pagination link "4" is displayed as current in top pagination

the pagination link "5" is displayed as current in top pagination
I click "Previous" pagination link on the top pagination on page 'Results'
the pagination link "4" is displayed as current in top pagination
I click "Next" pagination link on the top pagination on page 'Results'
the pagination link "5" is displayed as current in top pagination
